title: A note to users
description: Real example from Mermaid.js gantt documentation
steps: Real example from Mermaid.js gantt documentation

advanced.code:
gantt
    title A Gantt Diagram
    %% This is a comment
    dateFormat YYYY-MM-DD
    section Section
        A task          :a1, 2014-01-01, 30d
        Another task    :after a1, 20d
    section Another
        Task in Another :2014-01-12, 12d
        another task    :24d
